latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient number of toilets and sinks for the number of children in attendance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
At time of inspection child care service facility observed not maintained or in disrepair Dry sweeping observed in areas occupied by children
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Outdoor play area was observed not maintained nor free of hazards or nuisances at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
